column5: WELL HIT THE ROAD AT 6AM WITH MY BUD FLOATFISHIN(KEV). WASNT SURPRISED TO SEE NO ONE ELSE OUT SINCE IT WAS -18. WATER WAS ABIT DIRTY AND THE MORN WAS SLOW!!! KEV MISSED 2 IN THE EARLY MORN!! EITHER HE WAS STILL SLEEPING OR HIS EYELIDS WERE FROZEN  LOL MANAGED A FEW COOKIE CUTTERS MYSELF.   ALL THE FISH WERE JUST TAPPIN AND BARELY TAKIN DOWN THE FLOATS!!! THEN KEVS FLOATS DROPS LIKE A BRICK AND DOESNT COME BACK UP!!!ME AND KEV LOOK AT EACH OTHER AND THOUGHT THE SAME THING!!!! THIS IS A MONSTER!!!! KEV LEANS BACK AND HAMMERS A VICIOUS HOOKSET!!!! HERES THE RESULT  LOL CANT WAIT TO SEE THIS LITTLE FELLA IN A FEW YRS THE WAY HE HIT !!!  FINALLY MANAGED ONE MORE BEFORE WE LEFT !!! NICE HEN!!!   WASNT A KILLER DAY BY ANY MEANS BUT WAS NICE TO HAVE THE WATER TO OURSELVES!! HAD THE USUAL BLAST WITH YA KEV(MOSTLY AT YOUR EXPENSE) AND KEV LOVES THE EXTREME WEATHER AS WELL!!! IM SURE WELL BE OUT ALOT MORE!!! TX AGAIN BRO
Looks like a fun day!!  I am having withdrawls, I haven't been out in about two weeks..   I think it's time to change that.
great stuff man!! you sure found open water today.hahaha
Hey CC!  Great to see Steel reports from you again!  Was wondering if any were swimming around lately...maybe I'll have to give it a try again soon.
Hardcore  -18*C!!! Note to self: Don't follow CC's fishing trends,(January @ss freeze temp & Winter evening fishing) Do stay home and sleep, wait for warmer weekdays!

Just for the Southern contingent, -18C is less than 0F.  A mite chilly dere b'y, for float fishing, I should think, and we have an explanation for the lack of traffic on the trib.  Kudos to the hardcore effort.
Great report and pics CC  Good looking steel for sure.... congratulations Thanks for sharing Leechman
nice report and hat CC, I still have to get me one of those hat's for the Durham boys support...
TX ALL!!! COLD INDEED BUT THE FEW HUNDRED FOR THE SURVIVAL SUIT IS WELL WORTH IT  LOL GBW YA THAT HAT HAS COME IN HANDY TWICE  LOL PLUS MY WIFE WORKS THERE  LOL
hmmmm.....minus 18C....cold indeed......an average day up here   Congrats on the fish, nice looking trout...yum!
